kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.
kw.msg: ${output} = 2019-08-20 21:30:45 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-20 21:30:45 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: 2019-08-20 21:30:45 INFO MetricsConfig:118 - Loaded properties from hadoop-metrics2.properties 2019-08-20 21:30:45 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:374 - Scheduled Metric snapshot period at 10 second(s). 2019-08-20 21:30:45 INFO MetricsSystemImpl:191 - XceiverClientMetrics metrics system started 2019-08-20 21:30:46 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-F2B97E03BCDC->13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d: receive RaftClientReply:client-F2B97E03BCDC->13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d@group-8024D70BE3B7, cid=0, SUCCESS, logIndex=5, commits[13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d:c5] 2019-08-20 21:30:46 INFO GrpcClientProtocolClient:255 - client-F2B97E03BCDC->13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d: receive RaftClientReply:client-F2B97E03BCDC->13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d@group-8024D70BE3B7, cid=1, SUCCESS, logIndex=7, commits[13accd1a-1977-4d50-bb36-22276e6f2e3d:c8]

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.name: Execute
Run And Return Rc And Output
kw.doc: Runs the given command in the system and returns the RC and output.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Integers
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to integers.

kw.msg: ${result} = Found 3 items -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 1159555 2019-08-20 21:30 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/key1 -rw-rw-rw- 1 hadoop hadoop 22125 1970-03-09 19:26 o3fs://bucket1.vol1/ozone-44230 drwxrwxrwx - ...

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
